context: Tests whether the agent properly detects content duplication, applies similarity thresholds, and makes appropriate consolidation decisions following aggregation rules.

checklist.name: Similarity percentage calculation
checklist.description: Calculates content similarity percentages between skill pairs

checklist.name: 20% threshold application
checklist.description: Uses >20% similarity as aggregation candidate threshold

checklist.name: 35% critical threshold
checklist.description: Identifies >35% similarity as critical duplication requiring immediate action

checklist.name: Text similarity analysis
checklist.description: Performs line-by-line or content comparison to detect overlapping text

checklist.name: NEVER aggregate low-similarity
checklist.description: Follows the rule to never aggregate skills with low similarity or different domains

checklist.name: Domain fit evaluation
checklist.description: Considers whether skills serve similar purposes vs different domains

checklist.name: Consolidation recommendations
checklist.description: Provides specific recommendations for which skills to merge or keep separate

checklist.name: Pairwise comparison
checklist.description: Compares each skill against others systematically

checklist.name: Structural analysis
checklist.description: Considers similar file organization, reference patterns, or naming conventions
